Typing Game

About this project

This is a speed typing game in Vanilla JavaScript without using any frameworks or libraries. You can adjust the difficulty by selecting a level at the drop down list. You can earn 5 more seconds when you correctly type a word in the Easy mode, 3 seconds in the Medium mode, and 2 seconds in the Hard mode. It shows a total score when the time is up.
